    • Pacman

      public Pacman(Position startPos, double speed, double radius)
      Constructs a new Pacman instance.
      Parameters:
      startPos - the starting tile Position of Pacman.
      speed - the movement speed in tiles per second.
      radius - the radius of Pacman collision.
